title: spice soda bread
description: This staple dish is one of the first recipes I was ever taught. The lentils are simply cooked and are served with an even simpler five-spice soda bread, with absolutely no proving or kneading required. This may just be the most chilled-out meal you have ever made.
ingredients: 250g/9oz strong white bread flour, plus extra for dusting
1 tbsp Indian five-spice (cumin, mustard, fenugreek, nigella and fennel seeds)
